remarks: Lemma for ~ 4001prm .  Calculate a power mod.  In decimal, we calculate ` 2 ^ 4 0 0 = ( 2 ^ 2 0 0 ) ^ 2 == 9 0 2 ^ 2 = 2 0 3 N + 1 4 0 1 ` and ` 2 ^ 8 0 0 = ( 2 ^ 4 0 0 ) ^ 2 == 1 4 0 1 ^ 2 = 4 9 0 N + 2 3 1 1 ` ` == 2 3 1 1 ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Apr-2015.)
